thread.title: Target's clever redesign will make you love it even more
thread.title_full: Target's clever redesign will make you love it even more

author: Michelle Stein
title: Target's clever redesign will make you love it even more
text:
by Michelle Stein posted in Life It's no secret parents have a serious love affair with Target. But those of us with children will soon adore this magical department store on a whole new level. That's because Target has announced plans for a massive redesign that will make shopping easier, especially for families. In addition to changes to... Read...

Want to get the full story? Click on the headline above. And thanks for reading the BabyCenter Blog.
